title: Events get NFT tickets: Belong joins Cointelegraph Accelerator
description:
Belong, an app providing token-gated access to events, content and physical doors, has become the latest participant of Cointelegraph Accelerator.

The event industry, vital for fostering connections, culture and education, faces ongoing challenges that impact its efficacy and reputation. Issues like ticket fraud remain to be solved while ticket-related scams double in 2023.

Another pressing challenge is the struggle to cultivate meaningful engagement with attendees. In an era where digital interaction and content consumption habits are rapidly surpassing traditional alternatives, many events fail to capture and sustain the attention of their audiences. This engagement deficit is particularly evident in the difficulty of creating compelling pre-event anticipation, maintaining live interaction and extending the conversation post-event.

Read more

title: AI tokens jump 10% as Vitalik Buterin explains how AI can enhance security and efficiency on Ethereum
description:
Digital assets in the artificial intelligence sector continued their recent surge, increasing by 10%, as Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin stated that the technology could help the blockchain network mitigate its “biggest technical risk.” CryptoSlate’s data show that several tokens in the sector, including SingularityNET’s AGIX, 0x0.ai, Ocean Protocol’s OCEAN, The Graph’s GRT, Fetch.AI’s FET, and others, […]

The post AI tokens jump 10% as Vitalik Buterin explains how AI can enhance security and efficiency on Ethereum appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: AI’s Environmental Impact Under Scrutiny
description: In the rapidly advancing field of artificial intelligence (AI), the environmental implications of this technology’s growth are becoming increasingly apparent. As AI becomes more integrated into every aspect of our lives, from enhancing medical procedures to optimizing everyday tasks, its environmental footprint expands accordingly. This footprint includes direct carbon emissions from the electricity that powers […]

title: Children’s Committee to be Warned of Risks Associated with AI by Media Regulator
description: In an upcoming address to the Children’s Committee, Coimisiún na Meán, the media regulator, is set to caution against the dangers of children placing excessive trust in artificial intelligence (AI). The regulator will emphasize the potential amplification of harmful online content due to children’s reliance on AI systems, which were not primarily designed with their […]

title: IQ Wiki Expands to Korea, Eyes Further Asian Growth
description:

title: Bitcoin to $100K by June 2024: Robert Kiyosaki
description:
